mapper.select: select b.LAST_ORG_CODE, b.LAST_GRP_CODE, b.DEPT_CODE, a.MEM_CODE from ORG0001D a join ORG0005D b on a.MEM_ID = b.MEM_ID where a.MEM_ID = #{userId}

SELECT m.SCHDUL_ID as BSID, m.NO as BSNo, m.MONTH as BSMonth, m.YEAR as BSYear, m.STUS_CODE_ID as BSStatusID, s.CODE as BSStatusCode, o.SALES_ORD_ID as OrderID, o.SALES_ORD_NO as OrderNo, t.CODE as OrderAppType, NVL(rm.RESULT_ID, 0) BSRID, NVL(rm.NO, 0) as BSRNo, NVL(CAST(mem.MEM_TYPE as int), 0) MemTypeID, NVL(m.CODY_ID, 0) BSMemID, NVL(mem.MEM_CODE, 0) MemCode, NVL(CAST(mem.STUS as int), 0) MemStatusID, '01/01/1900' as FirstInstallDate, '' as InstallState, '' as InstallArea, NVL(mem2.MEM_CODE, '') ActionMemCode, c.NAME as BSCustName, c.NRIC as BSCustIC FROM SVC0008D m JOIN ORG0001D mem ON mem.MEM_ID = m.CODY_ID AND mem.MEM_CODE = #{memCode} JOIN SYS0038M s ON s.STUS_CODE_ID = m.STUS_CODE_ID JOIN SAL0001D o ON o.SALES_ORD_ID = m.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0029D c ON c.CUST_ID = o.CUST_ID JOIN SYS0013M t ON t.CODE_ID = o.APP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0006D rm ON rm.SCHDUL_ID = m.SCHDUL_ID AND rm.TYPE_ID = '306' AND rm.RESULT_IS_CURR = 1 JOIN ORG0001D mem2 ON mem2.MEM_ID = rm.CODY_ID WHERE m.MONTH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND m.YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')
